Parameters.Name: MEDIA2 STREAMING – G.711 (RTP-Unicast/UDP)
Parameters.Description: Use service/1 user name and password on Discovery tab

Test.Name: Profile with G711 encoder exists (one profile in list)
Test.Description: Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera

Test.Name: Profile with G711 encoder exists (several profiles in list)
Test.Description:
!!!!! Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera !!!!
DUT sends profle list with several profiles. There is one profile with PCMU

Test.Name: One Profile with AS and AE exists, current encoder is not equal to G711. Options contain G711
Test.Description:
!!!!! Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera !!!!
DUT sends profle list. There is one profile with Video Source and Audis encoder. Current encoder in not equal to PCMU. This audio encoder supports PCMU.

Test.Name: Profile with AS and AE exists, AE does not support G711 (one profile in profile list)
Test.Description:
!!!!! Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera !!!!
DUT has one profile with Audio. This Audio Encoder does not support PCMU.
Searching of other Audio Encoder is required.

Test.Name: Profile with AS and AE exists, AE does not support G711 (several profiles in profile list)
Test.Description:
!!!!! Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera !!!!
DUT has one profiles with Audio. Audio Encoders in these profiles do not support PCMU.
Searching of other Audio Encoder is required.

Test.Name: Profile with G711 encoder exists (several profiles)
Test.Description: Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera

Test.Name: No Profile with AS and AE
Test.Description:
!!!!! Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera !!!!!
Profile list does not contain profile with Video Source and Video Encoder

Test.Name: Several profiles. One Profile has AS and AE without supporting of G711
Test.Description:
!!!!! Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera !!!!
DUT sends profle list with several profiles. There is one profile with Video Source and Audio encoder. Audio encoder does not support PCMU Other profiles do not have audio.

Test.Name: DUT sends streaming for ACC encoder
Test.Description:
Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera
Old test is passed instead of failed

Test.Name: DUT sends SDP without PCMU
Test.Description:
Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera
Old test is passed instead of failed

Test.Name: Empty profile list
Test.Description: Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera

Test.Name: No AE with supporting of G711
Test.Description:
!!!!! Use service/1 login and password on Discovery Tab DUT simulator returns uri from 230 camera !!!!
All Audio Encoders do not support PCMU
